column5: 18 positive reviews on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) within five months!!!  Final nightly rate including all fees and taxes.  Ground floor condo is overlooking pool and minute walk from newly extended beach on the Seawall and it is in close proximity to many attractions what Galveston offers. Complex is very well maintained with two pools, hot tub and gym. My unit was recently completely renovated and refurnished this summer, when I have purchased it.
